title: The Shawshank Redemption
summary: A wrongly convicted banker spends nearly two decades in Shawshank Penitentiary, forging friendships and maintaining hope for freedom.

title: The Godfather
summary: An aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty seeks to transfer control of his empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
summary: Batman must confront the unpredictable and charismatic criminal mastermind, the Joker.

title: Pulp Fiction
summary: A darkly comedic crime film that intricately weaves together several interconnected short stories of murder, revenge, and redemption.

title: Schindler's List
summary: During World War II, a German businessman risks his life to save the lives of Jewish refugees from his factory workers.

title: 12 Angry Men
summary: In a steamy jury room, one man challenges the others to reconsider a murder conviction.

title: The Matrix
summary: A computer hacker learns that his reality is a simulated world, and joins a rebellion against the machines that control it.

title: Forrest Gump
summary: A simple man recounts his extraordinary life story, filled with pivotal moments in American history.

title: Goodfellas
summary: A young associate rises through the ranks of a crime family, learning the brutal realities of organized crime.

title: Inception
summary: A skilled thief extracts information from people's dreams, but soon becomes embroiled in a dangerous and complex mission.

title: Fight Club
summary: An insomniac office worker seeking a new identity falls into a nihilistic underground fight club.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
summary: A young FBI trainee seeks the help of an incarcerated, brilliant psychiatrist who is a former cannibalistic serial killer.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
summary: A cyborg detective travels back in time to protect a young boy who is targeted by a liquid metal Terminator.

title: Interstellar
summary: A team of explorers journeys through a wormhole near Saturn in a mission to locate a new home for humanity.

title: Spirited Away
summary: A young girl enters a magical world of spirits and monsters after her parents take her to a secluded resort.

title: The Lion King
summary: A young lion prince is forced into exile after his uncle murders his father and takes over the throne.

title: Toy Story
summary: A cowboy doll names Woody finds himself lost in the world and tries to return to his owner, Andy.

title: The Sixth Sense
summary: A child psychologist discovers that he can communicate with the dead.

title: Avengers: Endgame
summary: The culmination of ten years of storytelling, the Avengers must defeat Thanos and his army to save the universe.

title: Paddington 2
summary: A charming bear named Paddington finds himself in a spot of trouble when a stolen pop-up book leads him on a chaotic adventure.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
summary: A concierge at a famous European hotel navigates a series of events involving a priceless painting and a young lover.

title: Knives Out
summary: A detective investigates the suspicious death of a wealthy patriarch, surrounded by his eccentric family.

title: Little Women
summary: The story of the March sisters – Jo, Meg, Beth, and Amy – as they navigate love, loss, and ambition during the Civil War.

title: Coco
summary: A young musician named Miguel sets out on a magical journey through his great-grandfather's memories to pursue his dream.

title: Sing Street
summary: In 1980s Dublin, a teenager starts a band to impress a girl.

title: The Truman Show
summary: A man discovers his entire life is a constructed reality, broadcast to a global audience.

title: Chef
summary: A chef rediscovers his passion for cooking after losing his restaurant job.

title: The King's Speech
summary: A speech impediment threatens to derail the reign of a young king, and a speech therapist helps him overcome his challenge.

title: Forrest Gump
summary: A man with a low IQ recounts his extraordinary life story, marked by pivotal moments in American history.

title: The Princess Bride
summary: A fairytale adventure combining romance, comedy, and action, following the story of Westley and Buttercup.

title: Hunt for the Wilderpeople
summary: A rebellious teenager and his foster uncle go on the run in the New Zealand wilderness.

title: A Monster Calls
summary: A boy is visited by a tree-like creature who helps him confront his mother's terminal illness.

title: About Time
summary: A young man discovers he can travel through time and uses his ability to improve his life and relationships.

title: Pride & Prejudice
summary: The story of Elizabeth Bennet and Mr. Darcy's tumultuous romance in 19th-century England.

title: Arrival
summary: A linguist is recruited by the military to communicate with aliens who have arrived on Earth.

title: The Martian
summary: An astronaut is presumed dead and left behind on Mars, where he must use his ingenuity to survive and signal for help.

title: La La Land
summary: A jazz pianist and an aspiring actress fall in love in Los Angeles, navigating their dreams and ambitions.

title: The Notebook
summary: An elderly man recounts his timeless love story to a woman he meets in a nursing home.
